channel.title: Problem with npc dialogues for hiyascape aka czar
channel.description: Well if anyone has noticed on project czar, it has quite a few glitchs and hiyascape is czar based. Whenever I spawn an npc or put it in autospawn.cfg, following delta's "adding npc dialogues", It fishes lob-manta's. Everytime I spawn a new npc it does same thing or nothing at all. I think it is the fishing that is blocking dialogues from working yet I deleted the fishing between case 155. It stopped the fishing when you click an npc but I put dialogues to see if the npc can talk. STILL DOESN'T WORK...Anyone know what to do?

item.title: Problem with npc dialogues for hiyascape aka czar

item.description:
@baller1 wrote:

i wouldn’t use project czar because sometimes it gets viruses and that server has way to many glitches and laggs

plus czar sucks

they look a bit different but you will get the hang of it.

item.title: Problem with npc dialogues for hiyascape aka czar
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Well if anyone has noticed on project czar, it has quite a few glitchs and hiyascape is czar based. Whenever I spawn an npc or put it in autospawn.cfg, following delta’s “adding npc dialogues”, It fishes lob-manta’s. Everytime I spawn a new npc it does same thing or nothing at all. I think it is the fishing that is blocking dialogues from working yet I deleted the fishing between case 155. It stopped the fishing when you click an npc but I put dialogues to see if the npc can talk. STILL DOESN’T WORK…Anyone know what to do?

Read full topic
